thread.title: Veteran FOX Exec, Missy Halperin, Joins Gifts for Good as Head of Talent, Entertainment, & Strategic Alliances

author: cnbc.com
title: Veteran FOX Exec, Missy Halperin, Joins Gifts for Good as Head of Talent, Entertainment, & Strategic Alliances
text:
Former Fox Broadcasting EVP of Talent, Missy Halperin - who served as the network’s senior-most talent relations executive for nearly three decades - joins Gifts for Good team to help Hollywood’s celebrities and studios give back through gifting
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Gifts for Good , the only business gifting company that exclusively sells gifts that give back, announced today that Missy Halperin joined the team as Head of Talent, Entertainment, and Strategic Alliances. Halperin was FOX Broadcasting Company’s senior-most Talent Relations executive. As EVP of Talent Relations, she worked over the years with the casts and producers of hundreds of shows including Beverly Hills, 90210, Glee, The Simpsons, Family Guy, Empire, and American Idol. While at FOX, her duties included providing gifts on behalf of the company to all actors and executive producers.
In her new role at Gifts for Good , Halperin will be responsible for forging relationships between celebrities, studios, and large-scale events to incorporate social impact into their gift gifting programs. “During my time at FOX, I saw firsthand how important it was to find the perfect gift for each person and occasion. We took pride when we were able to incorporate a charitable donation or component. What attracted me to Gifts for Good was the fact that they are pioneering a new way for companies to incorporate good into their standard day-to-day operations,” Halperin said. “ Corporate social responsibility is playing an increasingly important role, and giving gifts that give back is an effortless way for companies to support the social, economic, and environmental causes that are increasingly important to their employees, customers, and other stakeholders .”
“One of our top priorities is to ensure that Gifts for Good is the go-to gifting service for talent and entertainment in Los Angeles, and Missy truly excels in that endeavor,” Laura Hertz, CEO of Gifts for Good said. “She is an unparalleled resource and friend to Hollywood’s celebrities, studio heads, agents, managers, and producers, and we are confident that the lifetime of experience she has as a relationship builder and connector will help us to do a world of good.”
Halperin will continue to run her own businesses, Missy Halperin Talent Group and Good Karma Creations, alongside her work at Gifts for Good.
For more information, please visit www.giftsforgood.com .
About Gifts for Good
Gifts for Good is a Los Angeles-based, online corporate gifting company that curates and customizes premium, posh, and purposeful gifts that give back. From Napa Valley wines, to luxe leather totes, and unique wooden headphones, each Gifts for Good item directly supports a wide range of nonprofits and charitable causes including: children-in-need, economic development, environment, homelessness, health, women-at-risk, and more. Gifts for Good offers companies of all sizes a complimentary gifting concierge service to help them facilitate high-end, meaningful gifting year-round. For more information, please visit www.giftsforgood.com .
